cu.explanation_en: Setting the global log level to an invalid enum 'invalid' will cause logging configuration errors and may prevent proper global logging.

du.explanation_en: Setting the global log level to an invalid enum 'invalid' will cause logging configuration errors and may prevent proper global logging.
du.explanation_zh: 將全局日誌等級設定為無效的枚舉值 'invalid'，會導致日誌配置錯誤，並可能阻止正確的全局日誌。
